snippet: “Perfect Man II” (a sequel to “The Perfect Man Show,” which consisted almost entirely of work by women) is a nearly all-male affair that attempts to take the measure of — what to call it? — contemporary masculine-ism.
lead_paragraph: “Perfect Man II” (a sequel to “The Perfect Man Show,” which consisted almost entirely of work by women) is a nearly all-male affair that attempts to take the measure of — what to call it? — contemporary masculine-ism.
